mapper.select: SELECT ACT.ACT_ID as activityId, ACT.ACT_TITLE as title, ACT.ACT_STITLE as subTitle, ACT_CONT as contents, ACT.ACT_TYPENAME as activityType, ACT_CT.ACT_COMPLETED_SDATE as startDay, ACT_CT.ACT_COMPLETED_FDATE as endDay, ACT_CT.ACT_IS_COMPLETED as completed, ACT_JL.ACT_GRADE as completedUserGrade FROM activity_tb AS ACT JOIN activity_join_list_tb AS ACT_JL ON ACT.ACT_ID = ACT_JL.ACT_ID JOIN moyeo_db.activity_progress_completed_tb AS ACT_CT ON ACT.ACT_ID = ACT_CT.ACT_ID WHERE ACT.ACT_TYPENAME= #{activityType} AND ACT_JL.STUDENT_ID= #{userId} AND ACT_JL.ACT_GRADE= #{grade};

SELECT ACT.ACT_ID AS activityId, ACT.ACT_TITLE AS title, ACT.ACT_STITLE AS subTitle, ACT_CONT AS contents, ST.STUDENT_NAME AS author, ACT.ACT_TYPENAME AS activityType, ACT_CT.ACT_COMPLETED_SDATE AS startDay, ACT_CT.ACT_COMPLETED_FDATE AS endDay, ACT_CT.ACT_IS_COMPLETED AS completed, ACT_JL.ACT_GRADE AS completedUserGrade FROM activity_tb AS ACT JOIN activity_join_list_tb AS ACT_JL ON ACT.ACT_ID = ACT_JL.ACT_ID JOIN moyeo_db.activity_progress_completed_tb AS ACT_CT ON ACT.ACT_ID = ACT_CT.ACT_ID JOIN student_tb AS ST ON ACT.STUDENT_ID=ST.STUDENT_ID WHERE ACT_JL.STUDENT_ID=#{userId} AND ACT.ACT_ID=#{activityId};
SELECT ST.STUDENT_NAME FROM activity_join_list_tb AS ACT_JL JOIN student_tb AS ST ON ACT_JL.STUDENT_ID = ST.STUDENT_ID WHERE ACT_JL.ACT_ID =#{activityId};
SELECT RESULT_FINISH AS result, RESULT_CONT AS thought FROM activity_result_tb WHERE STUDENT_ID=#{userId} AND ACT_ID=#{activityId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO activity_result_tb (RESULT_FINISH, RESULT_CONT, STUDENT_ID, ACT_ID) VALUES (#{result}, #{thought}, ${userId}, #{activityId});
